Ebbro P-4 P405 Nissan Skyline Super Silhouette (KDR30) 1982 Super Silhouette Series M. Hasemi

Purchased: 2014

From what I can make out from this, there were 4 races in the 1982 Super Silhouette Series. Hasemi won 2 of them and was a DNF in the other 2. No idea where he ended up in the final standings.
